lesson.title: What AI is (and what it is not)

questions.question: How does the concept "critical decisions without human review..." mentioned in the lesson impact achieving your goals?
options: As described in detail in the lesson, critical decisions without hum... increases effectiveness and reduces risk
No significant impact
Only matters theoretically
Only an optional element

questions.question:
How would you implement the practice "exercise (10–15 min) — AI use map

List ..." described in the lesson in your own work?
options: I follow the method described in the lesson step by step, document the results, and refine the process
I try everything at once
I only read, I don't apply
I wait for others to do it
